ygData.subject: Well, the patch is in...
ygData.msgSnippet: I did some smithing this morning, and despite my high hopes, nothing seems to have changed. I made metal bits, and things were exactly the same, no multiples,
ygData.messageBody:
I did some smithing this morning, and despite my high hopes, nothing seems to
have changed.

I made metal bits, and things were exactly the same, no multiples, even if I
used multiple units.

I made skewers, and the mold disappeared whether I failed or succeeded.

I made some banded (or tried to anyway), and the mold disappeared here too.

They never specifically said that molds would NOT disappear, but they certainly
implied it with their baking and sharpening stone examples.

Disappointed,
Jyzan
